Data: 13.55 Toss Australia have won the toss and will bat.
Rampaul to Watson, no run starts with a back of length ball outside off, left to the keeper
Rampaul to Watson, no run similar length just outside off, defended off the backfoot towards the off side
Rampaul to Watson, no run fuller this time, on middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on this time
Rampaul to Watson, no run length ball just outside off, Watson keeps bat and pad together as he defends solidly
Rampaul to Watson, 1 run back of a length and outside off, slashed off the backfoot towards backward point
Rampaul to Haddin, no run length ball angling into the pads, a confident punch to mid-on, straight towards the fielder
Smith to Watson, 1 run length ball on the pads, tickled down to fine leg
Smith to Haddin, no run back of a length ball just outside off, pushed towards cover
Smith to Haddin, 1 run fullish ball on offstump, pushed towards mid-off, a sharp single is taken
Smith to Watson, no run that ball jumps up sharply, Watson was looking to defend from the crease, is struck on the wrists
Smith to Watson, no run
Smith to Watson, FOUR runs short of length ball on the pads, a wonderfully timed clip off the pads send the ball racing to the square-leg boundary
Rampaul to Haddin, no run fullish ball, punched towards mid-on

Rampaul to Haddin, no run shout for lbw, turned down, pitching just outside off, and angling in, umpire thinks it's sliding down leg, and it hit the top of the flap of the back leg as well, Hawk-eye shows it's just hitting the top of leg, tough to give those
Rampaul to Haddin, 1 run length delivery on the stumps, Haddin clips it towards mid off for a quick single
Rampaul to Watson, no run tried to flick a legstump delivery, doesn't get bat on a ball that should have been put away
Rampaul to Watson, 1 run another attempted flick, inside-edged onto the pads
Rampaul to Haddin, 1 run eased towards mid-on for a single
Smith to Haddin, no run
Smith to Haddin, FOUR runs lovely hit from Haddin, comes down the track and lofts the ball for a one-bounce four to long-on

Smith to Haddin, no run dropped by Dowlin, simple chance to his left at second slip, Haddin looked to guide the ball towards third man, only gets it towards Dowlin, who really should have held on to that one
Smith to Haddin, no run

Smith to Haddin, no run another drop, this was a much tougher chance though, Haddin absolutely lashed the ball back towards the bowler, who tries to catch the ball which is coming neck high at him but can't hang on
Smith to Haddin, no run full ball just outside off, Haddin squeezes it into the ground and it reaches the keeper on the bouncer
Rampaul to Watson, no run shortish ball just outside off, Watson gets behind the line and defends off the back foot
Rampaul to Watson, FOUR runs half-volley on the pads, caressed wide of mid-on for a boundary, easy for Watson
Rampaul to Watson, SIX runs even better from Watson, overpitched again, Watson takes a stride forward and slams the ball flat and straight for six
Rampaul to Watson, (no ball) not a great over this for West Indies, the bowler oversteps as he sends down another full ball on the pads, driven towards mid-on
Rampaul to Watson, 1 run free-hit, a bouncer outside off, Watson hacks at it outside off, top-edge swirls over the head of cover point
Rampaul to Haddin, 1 run length ball on middle and off, punched down the ground, mid-on moves across to his left to cut it off
Rampaul to Watson, 1 run back of a length and just outside off, played with an angled bat towards backward point
Smith to Watson, no run short of length outside off, defended solidly off the backfoot
Smith to Watson, 1 run short ball is pulled away by Watson, along the ground to deep square leg

Smith to Haddin, 1 run overpitched on middle and leg, Haddin punches the ball towards mid-on, Pollard fields and throws down the stumps at the non-striker's end, Haddin had made his ground in time though
Smith to Watson, 2 runs short and a bit of width, slapped past cover point by Watson
Smith to Watson, no run on the pads, short of length, defended towards the leg side
Smith to Watson, 1 run pulled by Watson, not along the ground this time, the fielder in the deep waqs interested for a while, but it lands short of him
Rampaul to Watson, 1 wide wide down the leg side, just sprayed down Watson's pads

Rampaul to Watson, FOUR runs he like's that shot, just tees off down the ground with a big lofted shot off the front foot, intentionally hitting in the air and the ball goes miles up and beats long-on
Rampaul to Watson, 1 run better length, gets some cut, Watson nudges to the leg side
Rampaul to Haddin, 1 run fuller ball, hit with hard hands across the line toward midwicket
Rampaul to Watson, 1 run shorter in length, Watson allows it come on and then rotates the strike with a gentle dab toward backward point, using the pace of the ball
Rampaul to Haddin, 1 run turns this one off middle and leg to wide of backward square
Rampaul to Watson, no run slides down leg stumps, he swings and misses, the ball thudding off his pads to square leg
Smith to Haddin, no run big heave to one on a length, dragging it to the leg side
Smith to Haddin, 1 run again off the front foot, going at the ball hard, turning it toward mid-on

Smith to Watson, 1 run dropped at backward square leg, would have been a ripper! Watson flicks off his pads in the air, that ball was veering down and there for the hit, and Rampaul flings himself across to his left side but ends up parrying it away
Smith to Haddin, no run short of a length, Haddin gets back and across and defends
Smith to Haddin, no run gets back and defends again
Smith to Haddin, SIX runs shot! Fuller ball, angling in, and Haddin picks it up over mid-on
Miller to Watson, no run short ball, some turn, Watson goes back and punches to cover
Miller to Watson, 1 run slower in the air, dipping on the pads, clipped to midwicket
Miller to Haddin, 1 run tosses up invitingly just outside off and down goes Haddin, kneeling before reaching out and slogging across the line, not a clean hit but it drops safely
Miller to Watson, no run flat and quick, goes back and cuts toward backward point
Miller to Watson, no run straighter one, slides on and just misses the bat as Watson is hurried into a late dab, just struck on the flap outside the line of impact, well bowled Miller
Miller to Watson, 1 run short and he rocks back to pull past midwicket for one
Sammy to Watson, no run good ball to begin with, right up there on off and making Watson defend
Sammy to Watson, no run shorter in length, no room on offer, and Watson goes back to block
Sammy to Watson, no run good ball, on a length on off stump and Watson can only defend

Sammy to Watson, SIX runs well played, after three tidy balls Watson decides to take Sammy on, and does so to the half-volley with one of his preferred shots, the aerial drive over mid-on, hit through the line, and the ball sails over the man at long-on, superb shot
Sammy to Watson, 1 run full on the pads and flicked out to the deep
Sammy to Haddin, no run nice drive to one floated up outside off, but he can't beat point
Miller to Watson, no run first ball of the over is defended solidly off the front foot
Miller to Watson, 1 run back of a length ball is punched down to long-on
Miller to Haddin, no run fuller this time, tucked towards midwicket
Miller to Haddin, no run shortish ball, just outside off, batsman makes room and slashes it towards backward point
Miller to Haddin, 1 run sliding onto the pads, arm ball, turned towards short fine leg
Miller to Watson, 1 run on middle and leg, Watson stands tall and eases the ball towards mid-on
Sammy to Watson, no run short of length ball just outside off, solidly defended

Sammy to Watson, no run Watson misses out on that one, the fine leg is in the circle, the ball was on the pads, if Watson had got it past that fielder, it was four runs, but he glances it straight at him
Sammy to Watson, no run shortish ball just outside off, carved towards backward point
Sammy to Watson, 2 runs driven down towards midwicket
Sammy to Watson, 1 run a wristy whip towards deep square leg
Sammy to Haddin, 1 run Haddin glances it to backward square leg for a single
Miller to Haddin, 1 run Haddin is down the ground, lofts the ball towards long-on, mistimed, reaches the fielder after a few bounces
Miller to Watson, no run a quicker delivery, driven to mid-on
Miller to Watson, no run floated up on the middle and leg, Watson blocks it
Miller to Watson, 1 run a wild throw form Sammy at cover, lobs it over the keeper after Watson pokes it towards him
Miller to Haddin, SIX runs this time Haddin charges out of the crease, gets to the pitch of the ball and clobbers it over long-on for six
Miller to Haddin, no run
Sammy to Watson, SIX runs what a way to bring up your half-century, Watson slams that one wide of long-on for a six
Sammy to Watson, no run played down to short third man, straight at the fielder, so no run

Sammy to Watson, OUT well, that was a poor delivery to get out on, a full toss outside off, it was an attempted slower delivery, Watson looks to clear deep midwicket but his hoick can't clear the fielder there, a much-needed breakthrough for the Windes
Sammy to Haddin, no run
Sammy to Haddin, no run full ball outside off, driven firmly back to the bowler
Sammy to Haddin, 1 run chops the ball towards backward point
Pollard to Haddin, 1 run back of a length and into the pads, tucked towards midwicket by Haddin
Pollard to Ponting, 1 run again on the pads, easily clipped towards square leg for another single
Pollard to Haddin, no run back of a length and just outside off, Haddin looks to guide the ball towards third man, doesn't beat the man in the ring
Pollard to Haddin, no run same length, just outside off, Haddin defends back towards the bowler
Pollard to Haddin, 1 run on middle stump, Haddin shuffles across and nudges the ball towards square leg
Pollard to Ponting, no run short of length and well outside off, Ponting gets forward and jabs the ball towards point
Sammy to Haddin, 1 run length ball just outside off, driven towards mid-off
Sammy to Ponting, no run length ball on middle, Ponting pushes it back towards the bowler's right
Sammy to Ponting, no run a touch shorter and outside off, slashed towards backward point, smart fielding there
Sammy to Ponting, 1 run easy single after punching the ball towards wide mid-on
Sammy to Haddin, no run almost a yorker, just outside off, Haddin blocks it towards the off side
Sammy to Haddin, no run short of a length and outside off, driven towards extra cover
Pollard to Ponting, 1 run well outside off, Ponting checks his shot to get the ball away towards backward point

Pollard to Haddin, OUT bowled! not a replay Haddin will like to see again, the ball was miles outside off, Haddin was looking to mow it to the leg side, gets a bottom-edge that sends the ball onto the base of offstump, it's not been a great summer with the bat for Haddin
Pollard to Clarke, 1 wide Clarke is greeted with a mis-directed bouncer, going down the leg side
Pollard to Clarke, no run length ball well outside off, Clarke watchfully lets it go
Pollard to Clarke, no run pushed off the backfoot towards cover point
Pollard to Clarke, no run back of a length ball on middle and off, defended towards mid-on
Pollard to Clarke, no run full and outside off, driven firmly to short cover
Sammy to Ponting, 1 run played with soft hands towards deep square leg, thinks of taking the second but decides against it
Sammy to Clarke, no run 'Wait on' is the call after Clarke pushes the ball towards mid-on
Sammy to Clarke, no run this time the ball is driven to mid-on, Clarke charges out of the crease for a single but then heads back
Sammy to Clarke, 3 runs Clarke leans across and flicks the ball from outside off past a diving mid-on, not enough on it to reach the boundary
Sammy to Ponting, no run chop a ball that is well outside off towards backward point

Sammy to Ponting, 1 run Ponting pulls a short ball, keeps it along the ground, a direct hit from the deep meant Australia could have taken an extra run, but the umpire Billy Bowden had already called for drinks, so they don't take it, Billy races towards the dressing-room as soon as the drinks van comes on
Pollard to Ponting, 1 run wide outside off, Ponting drives towards cover for a single
Pollard to Clarke, 1 run Clarke helps himself to an easy single after punching the ball to long-on
Pollard to Ponting, 1 run short ball just outside off, cut away towards point
Pollard to Clarke, 1 run waltzes down the track to a back of length ball, eases the ball to mid-on and zips through for a single
Pollard to Ponting, 1 run same length from Pollard, Ponting stands tall and punches past a diving short cover
Pollard to Clarke, 1 run length ball outside off, chopped towards backward point for a single to bring up the Australian 100
Sammy to Clarke, 1 run middle stump delivery, Clarke walks across and whips the ball to square leg
Sammy to Ponting, no run shortish ball just outside off, Ponting gets behind the line and defends back towards the bowler
Sammy to Ponting, 1 run short of length outside off, Ponting opens the face to steer the ball towards backward point
Sammy to Clarke, 1 run on middle and off, easy single by punching the ball towards long-on
Sammy to Ponting, 1 run Ponting gets the simple single this time, pushing the ball towards mid-off
Sammy to Clarke, no run 'Wait on,' shouts Clarke after punching the ball towards cover off the front foot
Pollard to Ponting, 1 run on the pads, defended towards the leg side
Pollard to Clarke, 1 run again straying onto the pads, guided down to fine leg for a single
Pollard to Ponting, 2 runs Pollard sends a slower ball, Ponting mistimes his shot, gets the ball away towards wide long-on though
Pollard to Ponting, 1 run this time Ponting shuffles across and helps the ball to short fine leg
Pollard to Clarke, 1 run Clarke punches the ball down the ground and helps himself to a single
Pollard to Ponting, 1 run short and a bit wide, Ponting slaps it towards sweeper cover
Sammy to Ponting, 2 runs Ponting pulls the ball down to deep backward square leg
Sammy to Ponting, 1 run full and outside off, driven down towards mid-off for an easy single
Sammy to Clarke, 1 run Clarke continues to get the single by pushing the ball to long-on
Sammy to Ponting, 1 run shortish ball on off, Ponting punches off the backfoot towards cover
Sammy to Clarke, 1 run a bit of an edge as Clarke looks to carve the ball through off, trickles down to third man
Sammy to Ponting, no run defends a back of length ball outside off towards point
Pollard to Clarke, SIX runs Clarke decides he's had enough of singles, charges down the track and hammers the ball over long-on for six
Pollard to Clarke, no run blocked towards mid-off this time by Clarke
Pollard to Clarke, 1 run
Pollard to Ponting, 1 run pushed to mid-on off the front foot for a single
Pollard to Clarke, 1 wide way outside the offstump, left alone by Clarke
Pollard to Clarke, 1 run pretty wide again, length ball, Clarke moves across and opens the face to steer the ball to third man
Pollard to Ponting, FOUR runs half-volley on the pads, thank-you says Ponting, easy put away to fine leg for four
Gayle to Clarke, 1 run sways back and chops the ball towards point
Gayle to Ponting, 1 run brushed off the thigh pad towards midwicket
Gayle to Clarke, 1 run waltzes down the track and pushes the ball to mid-on
Gayle to Ponting, no run turns the ball towards square leg, straight towards the fielder
Gayle to Ponting, 1 run length ball is driven to wide long-on for a single
Gayle to Clarke, no run short ball, turning towards legstump, Clarke stands tall and flicks the ball, but can't beat the man at square leg
Miller to Ponting, 1 run driven towards sweeper cover for a single
Miller to Clarke, 1 run on the pads, turned towards midwicket for a single
Miller to Ponting, no run shortish ball just outside off, driven to short mid-off
Miller to Ponting, 1 run driven to long-on this time for a single
Miller to Clarke, no run clips a length ball on the pads towards midwicket
Miller to Clarke, 1 run nudged to square leg this time, wide of the fielder, so they get a run
Gayle to Clarke, 1 run Clarke again dances down the pitch, clips the ball towards midwicket
Gayle to Ponting, 1 run makes room and chops a ball just outside off towards backward point
Gayle to Clarke, 1 run third single of the over, pushes towards cover this time
Gayle to Ponting, no run too close to the midwicket fielder to get a run
Gayle to Ponting, 2 runs down the leg side, helped along to fine leg
Gayle to Ponting, 1 run more legstump offerings, dabbed to short fine leg again
Miller to Ponting, SIX runs Ponting goes big, came down the track and gave himself some room as well, clubbed it over long-off for six to bring up the 150
Miller to Ponting, no run blocked back to the bowler this time
Miller to Ponting, 1 run takes the easy single to long-on this time
Miller to Clarke, 1 run this time it's Clarke who gives the man at long-on some fielding practice
Miller to Ponting, 1 run carved towards sweeper cover
Miller to Clarke, 1 run why don't they bring long-on in? again Clarke pushes the ball towards long-on and walks through for the single
Gayle to Clarke, 2 runs gets back and cuts just wide of backward point for two
Gayle to Clarke, 1 run walks down and takes on the full, clipping past midwicket
Gayle to Ponting, 1 run slower ball down the pads, he sweeps fine and gets it well
Gayle to Clarke, no run walks out again, drives straight, Gayle falls as he intercepts
Gayle to Clarke, 1 run finer line and he nudges it out to square leg
Gayle to Ponting, 2 runs lines up a big swipe to one tossed up, connects well out to Smith at deep square leg, who over-runs the ball
Deonarine to Clarke, 1 run tossed up outside off, driven off the front foot to extra cover
Deonarine to Ponting, 1 run fuller on the pads, he walks into the shot and clips it away
Deonarine to Clarke, 1 run fuller ball, good use of the feet results in a drive to long-off
Deonarine to Ponting, 1 run tossed up, no turn, walks across and on-drives
Deonarine to Clarke, no run flatter and slower, he gets back and defends
Deonarine to Clarke, no run takes it off the pads with a bunt but straight to midwicket
Miller to Ponting, 1 run slowly floated outside leg and Ponting turns it away for one
Miller to Clarke, 1 run shorter, just, but Clarke pounces and slaps it past point
Miller to Ponting, 1 run goes back and hammers this one into the off side as well
Miller to Clarke, no run tossed up on the stumps, driven back to the bowler
Miller to Clarke, 1 run dances out and clips against the turn into the gap at square leg
Miller to Ponting, 1 run another drop! Wider ball outside leg stump, Ponting gets down and sweeps very hard to square leg where Deonarine jumps up and goes for it above his head but spills it
Deonarine to Ponting, 1 run tossed up, Ponting comes out and works it away
Deonarine to Clarke, 1 run driven off the front foot down the ground for one more
Deonarine to Ponting, 1 run goes back and punches the ball to extra cover and raises the bat
Deonarine to Clarke, 1 run pushed across Clarke who reaches out and steers it off the face
Deonarine to Ponting, 1 run better length and some drift too, Ponting drives off the front foot to cover
Deonarine to Clarke, 1 run steps out on dancing feet and drives the ball down to long-off
Miller to Clarke, 1 run again Clarke walks out and clips the ball on the full for a single
Miller to Ponting, FOUR runs superb stroke for four! Ponting makes room to about the sixth or seventh stump and drives the flighted ball on the rise past extra cover

Miller to Ponting, 1 run now he presses well forward and steers the ball to backward point, has a look up and sets off, Clarke responds but there's hesitation, then Hinds misses by some distance and they survive
Miller to Clarke, 1 run comes forward and dabs the ball for one more
Miller to Ponting, FOUR runs lovely shot, again he makes some room and this time lofts the ball over mid-off
Miller to Ponting, no run tossed up on the pads and he drives away to midwicket
Rampaul to Hopes, FOUR runs clears his front leg and slogs back in the air fiercely, Rampaul sticks out a hand but cannot stop it, Hinds is sluggish in the deep and he gets four
Rampaul to Hopes, FOUR runs nice shot! Rampaul digs it short, Hopes hooks and beats square leg
Rampaul to Hopes, FOUR runs now the attempted yorker-length ball outside off, but same result, as Hopes squeezes it past gully and gets four more

Rampaul to Hopes, 2 runs and dropped! Oh what a terrible day of fielding for West Indies! Rampaul should have had Hopes, who moves aside and drives on the air down the ground but Hinds, running in from long-on, makes a meal of a straightforward catch, in and out of his lap, shocking piece of work down there
Rampaul to Hopes, FOUR runs now he goes to the on side and drills this ball past extra cover
Rampaul to Hopes, 1 run serves up a full toss, Hopes walks out and drives it over Rampaul and down to long-off who does the fielding
Smith to Hopes, 1 run short ball down the stumps, he backs away and slogs over midwicket out to the deep where Nash, the sub, doesn't pick it up and reacts late
Smith to Voges, 1 run uses his feet and pushes it away for one more
Smith to Hopes, 1 run makes room but cannot connect well on the near yorker, yet steals one
Smith to Voges, FOUR runs good placement from Voges, who hops up and cuts the short ball in the air smack between cover and point
Smith to Voges, 1 run follows up with a full and straight ball, Voges clears his toes and drives down the ground
Smith to Hopes, FOUR runs now he tries the lap shot and pulls it over pretty well, just reaching across and taking if from just about off stump and placing it past short fine leg
Rampaul to Clarke, no run starts to press forward and then clips with the movement to square

Rampaul to Clarke, 1 leg bye tries the shot across the line again but this one is shorter and raps him on the flap as he steps across the sticks, cuing an enthusiastic and optimistic appeal, no chance that was out because of the shuffle and the height, so the result is a leg bye
Rampaul to Ponting, 1 run comes forward and drives the ball down the ground
Rampaul to Clarke, 2 runs walks across again and works the ball past square leg
Rampaul to Clarke, no run driven to cover, where the fielder deflects it away
Rampaul to Clarke, no run ouch! Shorter in length, cuts back in sharply at a good height and smacks Clarke in the nether regions, pretty much flush, and down he goes to catch his breath

Pollard to Ponting, OUT and he strikes first ball! Is he the one-day Graeme Swann? First ball of his spell, Pollard hits a length and as the ball angles across Ponting opens the face and runs it off the face to a tumbling Ramdin who holds on to a neat catch
Pollard to White, no run full ball outside off, White walks into it and drives to cover
Pollard to White, no run straighter ball, better length, and White keeps it out
Pollard to White, FOUR runs tries a short ball but at that pace it sits up like a tennis ball and White, getting inside the line, swats it past square leg for four
Pollard to White, no run change of pace, fuller in length, pressed back with a full face
Pollard to White, no run itching to come forward, White ends up adjusting to press it to point
Pollard to Voges, 1 run short of a length to Voges who steers it down to third man
Pollard to Hopes, no run full and wide, he backs away and throws the bat at ball and misses
Pollard to Hopes, FOUR runs nearly a yorker but too full, chipped in the air over mid-on out to that man Hinds who doesn't pick it and the ball goes over his palms
Pollard to Hopes, 2 runs this time a chip shot, using his wrists, over mid-on as he reaches to outside off
Pollard to Hopes, FOUR runs good ol' fashioned slog, just heaving across the line over midwicket
Pollard to Hopes, 1 wide bad ball, very wide down the pads, Hopes shuffles but can't connect
Pollard to Hopes, 1 run yorker outside off, he steers it down to Sammy at third man for one
Miller to Hopes, FOUR runs tossed up outside off, slightly short, Hopes gets back and cuts behind point, the sweeper cannot cut it off and there's an excellent half-century
Miller to Hopes, FOUR runs hah, easy pickings! Makes room, dances out, and drills it over extra cover
Miller to Hopes, 1 run low full toss but Hopes doesn't put it way, instead driving to long-off
Miller to Voges, no run floated down the stumps, Voges sweeps and gets it tangled up off his arm, then into the pads
Miller to Voges, SIX runs awesome chip shot from Voges, skipping out to the ball and then lofting high and handsome for a straight six
Miller to Voges, 1 run speared in, Voges makes room and drives and gets an inside edge past leg stump

17.45 Amazing stand of 82 in 43 balls. Stunning late assault. Hopes was devastating, Voges was effective. Australia finish with 324. Don't see Windies chasing this down given the summer they've had. Join us in about 40-odd minutes for the chase. During the meantime, how about checking out what our panelists have decided are the
Doug Bollinger has the ball, can Chris Gayle survive the opening burst?
Bollinger to Gayle, 1 run starts with a length ball on middle., Gayle moves across awkwardly and works it to square leg
Bollinger to Deonarine, 1 run length ball outside off, edged away through backward point
Bollinger to Gayle, 1 run a touch fuller this time, on middle and leg, Gayle stays back and works the ball towards backward point
Bollinger to Deonarine, 1 wide lost his radar there, swinging way down the leg side, Haddin dives across to collect, good work that
Bollinger to Deonarine, no run length ball on middle and off, Deonarine playing off the backfoot, jumps and defends towards the bowler
Bollinger to Deonarine, 1 run same length, a bit of width on offer, batsman swings at it, gets an edge past backward point
Harris to Deonarine, no run starts with a fullish ball just outside off, blocked towards cover
Harris to Deonarine, no run back of a length, on off, defended off the backfoot towards point
Harris to Deonarine, no run similar length, on middle and off, tucked off his thigh pad towards square leg
Harris to Deonarine, no run length ball outside off, left alone by the batsman
Harris to Deonarine, no run on middle and leg this time, blocked off the backfoot towards the leg side
Harris to Deonarine, no run full and just outside off, driven firmly to mid-off, and that's a maiden
Bollinger to Gayle, SIX runs shortish ball, Gayle goes for the pull, it's the top-edge, crowd gets excited thinking there's a catch at fine leg but the ball sails over the rope
Bollinger to Gayle, SIX runs and another top-edge six, not as short as the previous one, again goes for the pull, another top-edge, soaring over slips and the third man boundary
Bollinger to Pollard, no run solidly defended, getting on the front foot, and blocks
Bollinger to Pollard, no run again Pollard gets behind the line and defends back down the pitch
Bollinger to Pollard, no run back of a length, on middle stump, Pollard taps the ball towards midwicket
Harris to Deonarine, 2 runs length ball outside off, pushed towards sweeper cover for a quick two
Harris to Deonarine, no run back of a length on middle and leg, defended awkwardly off the back foot
Harris to Deonarine, no run same length but outside off, blocked towards point
Harris to Deonarine, no run full and pitching on off, more defence from Deonarine
Harris to Hinds, no run big appeal for lbw, turned down by the umpire
Bollinger to Pollard, no run fullish ball outside off, defended by Pollard towards the bowler
Bollinger to Pollard, no run back of a length on legstump, brushed off the thigh pad towards backward square leg
Bollinger to Pollard, no run angling across the batsman, who drops his wrists and sways out of the line to let the ball go
Bollinger to Pollard, no run angling across the batsman, who lets it go again
Bollinger to Pollard, 1 run back of a length on the leg stump, clipped to fine leg for a single
Bollinger to Hinds, no run full and just outside off, punched crisply to mid-off
Harris to Pollard, 1 wide pace and bounce, sits up wide off and wide called
Harris to Pollard, no run too straight, tucked to Smith at backward square leg
Harris to Pollard, no run pitches on a length outside off, some shape, left alone
Harris to Pollard, no run good length on off stump and he's forced to defend
Harris to Pollard, no run shorter in length and still Pollard is made to defend
Harris to Pollard, FOUR runs just a bit full and he presents a full face of the bat, pushing the ball past mid-off, really a good stroke from Pollard
Harris to Pollard, no run hops across and twirls the bat of ball's way as it passes
Bollinger to Hinds, no run pitches on a good area and gets Hinds pushing to the off side

Bollinger to Hinds, 3 runs smashes this one, a wee bit fuller, on the up and evades a leaping mid-off, that was hit without much footwork but Hinds made sure he went hard and fast, Voges does the fielding in the deep
Bollinger to Pollard, no run good length ball angles across and he leaves it be
Bollinger to Pollard, no run and again he works the ball across Pollard who leaves it be
Bollinger to Pollard, no run fuller in length and Pollard plays it straight to mid-off
Bollinger to Pollard, no run bit wider and there to be hit, Pollard drives but can't beat mid-off
Harris to Hinds, no run drives off the front foot, nice and straight, back down the track
Harris to Hinds, no run angles wider this time and Hinds watches it through to Haddin
Harris to Hinds, no run now he wafts at the identical delivery outside off and gets beaten
Harris to Hinds, no run lovely channel being worked here, on a length outside off, not full, not short, and it keeps Hinds in two minds and this time he decides to leave well enough be
Harris to Hinds, no run straightens the line to off stump and Hinds punches to cover
Harris to Hinds, no run back to that teasing spot about a foot or so outside off and Hinds leaves
McKay to Pollard, 1 wide starts off down leg stump with a short ball which Pollard lets pass
McKay to Pollard, 1 run fuller outside off and straightening, Pollard starts to leave but the ball clips the other half of the angled bat and runs to third man
McKay to Hinds, 1 run overpitched and driven firmly toward mid-off where Bollinger falls to his right and saves three runs, big man that and he hits the ground with a thud, well stopped
McKay to Pollard, no run short of a length and defended to the off side
McKay to Pollard, FOUR runs full and straight and well flicked off the pads in front of square
McKay to Pollard, no run thrashes that one on the rise, looking to go downtown, but misses
McKay to Pollard, no run short of a length and Pollard gets nice and tall to defend
Harris to Hinds, 1 run on a length and he pushes a straight drive to mid-off
Harris to Pollard, no run short of a length on the stumps, worked to square leg
Harris to Pollard, 3 runs out comes the big heave now, not timed too well but he goes up over midwicket, drops safely in the deep
Harris to Pollard, 2 runs full on middle and leg and clipped past square leg to the sweeper
Harris to Pollard, FOUR runs ah, driven on the rise off the front foot, but not with a big stride forward, and Pollard pops the ball tantalisingly over the covers
McKay to Simmons, no run short of a length outside off to Simmons who tries to play, then leave, but as the bat twirls it clips the ball and rolls to backward point
McKay to Simmons, no run brings him onto the front foot this time and he defends
McKay to Simmons, 1 run gets back nicely and forces this ball to backward point where Ponting allows the ball through his legs
McKay to Pollard, no run short of a length, wee bit of cut, steered to Ponting who does well now
McKay to Pollard, 1 run goes back and bunts the shorter ball past square leg
McKay to Simmons, no run fuller in length, driven to Smith on the circle at midwicket
Hopes to Pollard, no run comes forward and pushes the ball back to the bowler
Hopes to Pollard, no run straighter ball off a shorter length, he tries the nudge but gets hit on the flap
Hopes to Pollard, 1 wide too fine and it sneaks past leg stump to Haddin
Hopes to Pollard, no run
Hopes to Pollard, no run good length delivery, Pollard pushes it to Hopes' left side
Hopes to Pollard, no run well that took off! Pitches on a length and zips up off the deck, surprising Pollard who presses forward and then does well to drop the hand and rear away
Hopes to Pollard, no run legcutter to end the over, defended toward point
McKay to Simmons, no run short of a length to Simmons who gets tall and defends to point
McKay to Simmons, no run comes forward and then defends to backward point
McKay to Simmons, no run straighter ball, good length though, and he defends it back
McKay to Simmons, no run very watchful stuff this, Simmons defending off the front foot
McKay to Simmons, no run hops back to a shorter ball and steers it straight to point again
McKay to Simmons, no run excellent over from McKay, ending with one short of a length to get Simmons hopping back in line and defending to cover
Hopes to Pollard, no run offcutter, short of a length, Pollard stands tall to drive and gets an inside edge onto his thigh
Hopes to Pollard, SIX runs walks out, Hopes digs it in short, draws the top edge on the pull, Haddin runs back a long ways but that is six
Hopes to Pollard, no run back of a length, some shape, this time he defends
Hopes to Pollard, 2 runs fuller and now he clips it off the stumps to deep midwicket
Hopes to Pollard, 1 run nicely played, Pollard gets across the sticks and taps the ball to square
Hopes to Simmons, no run drives a fuller ball to backward point's left side
McKay to Pollard, FOUR runs lovely shot there, just pirouetting on the short ball and getting maximum over midwicket
McKay to Pollard, no run right up there on off stump and he turns it to the leg side
McKay to Pollard, no run back of a length, pushed off the back foot to Smith at midwicket, who runs around and flings himself to his left to save a single
McKay to Pollard, no run goes back and pushes the ball to the leg side again
McKay to Pollard, 1 run shorter ball, Pollard starts walking across and then rides the bounce and angles the ball to place it wide of Smith for a single
McKay to Simmons, 1 run goes back to tap the ball off the pads to square leg
Hopes to Simmons, no run goes back and punches an offcutter to the covers
Hopes to Simmons, no run tries something different, walking forward and across the sticks, then flicking straight to Smith at midwicket who releases and hits the bat
Hopes to Simmons, no run pitches on a length, Simmons drives on the up to cover
Hopes to Simmons, 1 run again he uses his crease in an attempt to manipulate the bowler, works it to square leg and Smith runs after the ball and slides to stop
Hopes to Pollard, 1 run ah, now a loose chip shot as Pollard loses a hand off the bat, just takes it from outside off and manages to beat mid-on and midwicket
Hopes to Simmons, no run nice steer off the front foot but straight to backward point
McKay to Pollard, 1 run takes on the short ball with a controlled pull through midwicket
McKay to Simmons, no run goes deep in his crease and uses the wrists to turn the ball to midwicket
McKay to Simmons, FOUR runs now he gets some groove going, moving back and across and pummeling the ball over mid-on for four
McKay to Simmons, 1 run now he punches an on-drive to mid-on and puts pressure on Bollinger
McKay to Pollard, 2 runs cuts back in off a fuller length and Pollard works it past midwicket
McKay to Pollard, 1 run short ball, Pollard swivels and bunts past square leg
Hopes to Pollard, SIX runs lovely shot there, just pirouetting on the short ball and getting a beefy six over midwicket
Hopes to Simmons, no run hops across and shoulders arms to one outside off
Hopes to Simmons, no run goes back and keeps this one out too
Hopes to Simmons, no run short of a length, Simmons hops in line and defends
Hopes to Simmons, no run slashes a leaden-footed shot outside off and gets beaten
Smith to Smith, no run tosses it up and lands it nicely, Smith drives it back.
Smith to Smith, no run fuller ball, Smith clips it to midwicket
Smith to Smith, FOUR runs gives it some air, gets some dip, Smith heaves and beats mid-on, Bollinger dives, the ball wins the race
Smith to Smith, no run wrong 'un, middle and leg, stabbed at in defence
Smith to Smith, 1 run driven off the front foot, Smith runs across, mid-off runs in
Smith to Simmons, no run fuller and flatter with some drift into leg stump, Simmons loses balance as he jams the ball to the off side
Hopes to Smith, no run reaches out and drills the length ball down to mid-off
Hopes to Smith, no run pitches on a length and he keeps bat and pad together while blocking
Hopes to Smith, no run hits a shorter length and jumps up to beat the bat
Hopes to Smith, 1 run fuller and he pushes tentatively at it, turning past midwicket
Hopes to Simmons, 1 run gets inside the line of this short one, hopping across the sticks, and runs it down to backward square leg
Hopes to Smith, 1 run presses forward and dabs the ball to mid-on for a quick single
Smith to Smith, no run tossed up on middle and leg and Smith prods it back
Smith to Smith, SIX runs big shot this time, Smith clearing the front foot and swinging the ball over long-on for half a dozen
Smith to Smith, no run flatter ball, Smith goes back to dab it fine but is beaten for bounce
Smith to Smith, no run goes back in the crease and pushes the wrong'un to midwicket
Smith to Smith, 1 run floats it up just outside off and Smith drives off the front foot to point
Smith to Simmons, no run goes back and cuts the shorter ball to Hopes at short third man
Hopes to Smith, 1 run gets up to the short ball and works the wrists, lapping the ball past midwicket
Hopes to Simmons, no run back he goes, punching this ball to point
Hopes to Simmons, FOUR runs well played, sees room outside off and brings the bat down firmly to back-cut past point, leaving third man with plenty of work but he has no chance
Hopes to Simmons, 1 run gets outside the line and pushes the ball to cover for a single
Hopes to Smith, no run pitches back of a length, Smith walks across and turns it to leg
Hopes to Smith, no run fuller ball, on-driven straight to White at midwicket
Smith to Simmons, FOUR runs too short and Simmons cuts past short third man for four more
Smith to Simmons, no run tossed up down the pads, worked off the front foot to square
Smith to Simmons, 1 run nicely floated up on a length, getting Simmons driving to long-off
Smith to Smith, no run slower through the air and that results in some dip, but Smith hits across the line to midwicket
Smith to Smith, 2 runs slides down the pads and he gets a touch on it
Smith to Smith, FOUR runs lines up a flat-batted swipe that beats Bollinger at cow corner
Bollinger to Simmons, FOUR runs slapped! Simmons greets Bollinger by backing away and charging and slamming the ball down past mid-off, straight as a whistle and fiercely struck
Bollinger to Simmons, 2 runs well played again, rising to the short ball and angling the bat to work it past midwicket

Bollinger to Simmons, OUT short of a length on off stump, Simmons goes back and across and pushes to cover, takes a step forward, then hesitates, at the other end Smith sets off but gets shooed back and that does him in as Clarke nails a direct hit, superbly fielded there in the covers and West Indies lose their sixth
Bollinger to Simmons, 2 runs gets back and works the short ball past midwicket, Smith chases and releases
Bollinger to Simmons, no run nice and straight and Simmons presents a full face of the bat
Bollinger to Simmons, no run on a length, no room on offer, tapped straight to point
Smith to Ramdin, 1 run low full toss first ball, which Ramdin bunts to wide of midwicket
Smith to Simmons, 1 run goes back and plays his preferred cut shot to backward point
Smith to Ramdin, 1 run flat ball, no turn, he goes back and punches it
Smith to Simmons, no run fuller and slower, pitches on leg and he plays it to midwicket
Smith to Simmons, no run drifts in, too short though and that is punched of the off side
Smith to Simmons, 1 run better line, drifts in and he plays it with a stride forward

Bollinger to Simmons, OUT smacked but straight to Clarke at cover! Bollinger drags it short as Simmons goes to the leg side, looking to smack it down the ground, and the result is a flat-batted slap into the vice-captain's lap, that was hit hard and should leave a sting, but well held
Bollinger to Sammy, 1 wide welcomes him with a bouncer, Sammy flinches and takes his eyes off it
Bollinger to Sammy, no run gets across gingerly and defends the ball to midwicket
Bollinger to Sammy, no run angles across and now Sammy shoulders arms
Bollinger to Sammy, 1 run fuller ball, squirted off the front foot past Ponting at backward point
Bollinger to Ramdin, 1 run full on the stumps, clipped with the movement to midwicket
Bollinger to Sammy, 1 run better shot, gets to the pitch and drives handsomely to extra cover
Smith to Sammy, SIX runs super shot, just gets the high elbow in play and launches a length ball over mid-off
Smith to Sammy, no run flatter ball, he comes forward and defends
Smith to Sammy, no run slides in, this time he works it to the leg side
Smith to Sammy, 1 run shuffles and glances the ball around the corner
Smith to Miller, 2 runs goes back and puts the short ball into the covers for two
Bollinger to Sammy, no run full outside off, beats the bat
Bollinger to Sammy, no run on the stumps, no room at all, and he has to defend
Bollinger to Sammy, no run and again, right up there, some cut, and that's defended back
Bollinger to Sammy, no run shorter in length, Sammy is surprised and stabs at it and the ball runs off his gloves to the leg side
Bollinger to Sammy, no run pushed across and he shoulders arms
Bollinger to Sammy, no run and again he gets forward and shoulders arms
Smith to Miller, FOUR runs swats this one across the line and beats midwicket and mid-on
Smith to Miller, 2 runs slower ball, more flight, fuller and wider too, it pitches and turns and takes the edge past slip
Smith to Miller, no run wrong' un on middle and leg and he defends it back
Smith to Miller, 1 run comes forward and drives the fuller ball to mid-off
Smith to Sammy, 1 run too short and Sammy punches off the back foot to cover
Smith to Miller, no run another appeal as the wrong' un strikes the front pad, but there were two sounds and that puts the doubt in the umpire's mind, which replays show was the right move
Harris to Sammy, no run back of a length outside off and no shot offered
Harris to Sammy, no run just a bit shorter and he defends to the off side
Harris to Sammy, no run gets up on the toes to again push the ball in front of cover
Harris to Sammy, FOUR runs good shot, a flowing straight drive to one pitched, bang past mid-on
Harris to Sammy, no run goes back to that shorter length and Sammy goes back to defending
Harris to Sammy, 2 runs gets up and slices the shorter and wider ball past backward point
Smith to Miller, 1 run tossed up, no turn, driven off the front foot into the cover for one
Smith to Sammy, 1 run flatter and straighter and Sammy pushes off the back foot to point
Smith to Miller, 1 run pitches on a length and that's driven over mid-off to long-off
Smith to Sammy, 1 run flatter ball drifts in and he works an inside edge off the pads
Smith to Miller, no run tossed up, comes forward and drives to the off side
Smith to Miller, 2 runs floated up on middle and off and he slashes it past cover
Harris to Sammy, 1 run gets back and works the ball off the stumps to midwicket
Harris to Miller, no run on the stumps and he defends to the off side
Harris to Miller, no run straighter ball, Miller pushes it back, Harris sticks out his right hand and misfields
Harris to Miller, no run down the pads, turned to midwicket
Harris to Miller, 2 runs goes for a big smash this time and mistimes it to long-off
Harris to Miller, no run good short one gets some lift and surprises the batsman
Smith to Sammy, no run tossed up on middle and leg and Sammy drives it back to Smith
Smith to Sammy, no run another firm drive, high elbow and all, but straight to cover
Smith to Sammy, SIX runs good shot, gooood shot! Sammy goes downtown and latches on well, grabbing the tossed up ball and lofting high and high over long-on for six
Smith to Sammy, 1 run flatter, expectantly, and he plays it back past Smith
Smith to Miller, 2 runs goes back and nudges the ball off the pads
Smith to Miller, 3 runs edged wide of Clarke at slip, neither forward nor back, feeling for it
McKay to Miller, 1 run presses forward to a length ball and runs it wide of point
McKay to Sammy, no run shorter in length and he runs it to point too
McKay to Sammy, no run reaches out to cut but cannot beat cover or point
McKay to Sammy, no run gets nice and tall and pushes the ball to point
McKay to Sammy, FOUR runs nicely driven on the rise over extra cover, freeing the arms, good shot
McKay to Sammy, 1 run shorter ball and pulls uneasily down to long leg with an edge
Smith to Sammy, 1 run flighted on the stumps, Sammy takes it off the front pad for one
Smith to Miller, 1 run short and flat, Miller chops it into the covers for one more
Smith to Sammy, no run again too short and Sammy punches it to extra cover
Smith to Sammy, SIX runs another flowing shot from Sammy against Smith, skipping out and hitting straight through the line, dumping that over cow corner for the biggest six of the day
Smith to Sammy, 2 runs dropped in the deep! Sammy pulls a half-tracker over midwicket, out to where David Hussey runs across a long way and dives but cannot hold on
Smith to Sammy, 2 runs gets back and pushes the ball away
McKay to Rampaul, no run gets back and pushes at the ball, point runs in
McKay to Rampaul, no run gets over it and pushes it away again
McKay to Rampaul, 1 run hits a length and moves away, Rampaul is squared up and edges to point, Ponting collects and hits the stumps and Rampaul gets an overthrow
McKay to Sammy, no run hits a good length, Sammy pushes at it uneasily outside off
McKay to Sammy, FOUR runs too short so Sammy deposits that over mid-on's head for four
Smith to Rampaul, no run no turn, pretty short, and Rampaul goes back to block
Smith to Rampaul, 2 runs fuller and wider and now he slashes over the covers, but Sammy sends him back after they run two
Smith to Rampaul, 1 run out comes the slog sweep which gets him a single
Smith to Sammy, 1 run comes out but cannot connect on the loopy delivery, wasn't to the pitch and ends up pushing it down the ground for a single

End of the ODI series and its 4-0 to Australia. Smith gets his second. The players head off and shake hands with the opposition. We have two Twenty20s to go, the first of which is on February 21 in Hobart. We will have the action live for you. Ponting is the Man of the Series for his 293 runs at 73.75. Bye!
Australia won by 125 runs
Player of the match is James Hopes, AUS
